Package com.dzieger.exceptions

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.dzieger.exceptions.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
GlobalExceptionHandler is used to handle exceptions globally.
Version:
1.0
